removeBalls(int, int) - Method in class Collecto.GridBoard
Starts at the location on the board defined by row and column, selects that ball and looks whether there are neighbouring balls of the same colour.
removeBalls(Move) - Method in class Collecto.GridBoard
Goes over the entire row or column in the direction of a given move, removes all balls that have neighbours of the same colour by calling the GridBoard.removeBalls(int, int) method and returning all removed balls in an ArrayList.
